items.content_html: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.
items.title: GWMDhananjaya/React-color-picker: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.

items.content_html: Data Fetch React is a lightweight and efficient React.js application designed to demonstrate seamless API data fetching and rendering. It provides a simple yet powerful example of integrating external APIs with React’s component-based architecture. Built with Vite, the project ensures fast performance and optimized loading.
items.title: Argus-66/DataFetchReact: Data Fetch React is a lightweight and efficient React.js application designed to demonstrate seamless API data fetching and rendering. It provides a simple yet powerful example of integrating external APIs with React’s component-based architecture. Built with Vite, the project ensures fast performance and optimized loading.

items.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: react-language-selector-lite is a lightweight and customizable React component designed to make language selection seamless and intuitive. It offers comprehensive language lists, search functionality, theming support, and flexible customization options.
items.title: JamiuShaibu/react-language-selector-lite: react-language-selector-lite is a lightweight and customizable React component designed to make language selection seamless and intuitive. It offers comprehensive language lists, search functionality, theming support, and flexible customization options.

items.content_html: A lightweight, custom implementation of a Redis-like server built from scratch using Node.js. This server supports a subset of Redis commands and features, providing a simple yet powerful in-memory key-value store with additional functionality like transactions, expiry, multiple execution and persistence.
items.title: Sadaf2005/ReCache: A lightweight, custom implementation of a Redis-like server built from scratch using Node.js. This server supports a subset of Redis commands and features, providing a simple yet powerful in-memory key-value store with additional functionality like transactions, expiry, multiple execution  and persistence.
